snippet: House Republicans from high-unemployment regions planned to send the House speaker a letter urging him to take up the Senate bill or something similar.
abstract: Senate is expected to easily approve legislation restoring unemployment benefits to nearly three million people, throwing bill to divided House where Republicans favor starkly different approaches to the issue; House Republicans from high-unemployment regions plan to send House Speaker John A Boehner a letter urging him to take up Senate bill or something similar.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans from high-unemployment regions planned to send the House speaker a letter urging him to take up the Senate bill or something similar.

headline.main: Senate Set to Pass Bill Extending Jobless Aid
headline.print_headline: Senate Set to Pass Bill Extending Jobless Aid
